Manage envato integration related config: Manage envato integration related configuration or disable it completely.
Enable envato integration (social login,: Enable envato integration (social login, purchase code validation, sales reports and more).
Require users to enter a valid purchase:
Require users to enter a valid purchase code in order to register and submit support requests.
      Envato social login will also check for purchase code automatically when this is enabled.
Require users to have active support for: Require users to have active support for item on envato in order to be able to create tickets.
Users will only be able to find articles: Users will only be able to find articles for items that they have purchased.
This will automatically import all your:
This will automatically import all your envato items for use as categories in new ticket and
      ticket list pages.
Configure help center settings and impor: Configure help center settings and import/export help center data.
In what way should help center articles: In what way should help center articles be ordered by default.
Removes full ticket thread from email re: Removes full ticket thread from email respones, unless it's the initial agent response.
Import and export help center data (arti: Import and export help center data (articles, categories, images, tags) in a .zip file for backup or migration.
Are you sure you want to import help cen: Are you sure you want to import help center data?
This will erase all existing articles an: This will erase all existing articles and categories.
From which folder emails should be impor: From which folder emails should be imported. Leave empty to import all emails in the inbox.
Create new tickets from emails received: Create new tickets from emails received via this connection.
If email is in reply to existing ticket,: If email is in reply to existing ticket, create a new reply.
Configure different handlers for turning: Configure different handlers for turning incoming emails into tickets and replies. You can enable multiple handlers at the same time.
If email can't be matched to existing ti: If email can't be matched to existing ticket, create a new ticket from it.
If email can be matched to existing tick: If email can be matched to existing ticket, create a new reply for that ticket from the email.
Send a notification to customer via emai: Send a notification to customer via email informing them that their ticket has been received.
OpenAI API key is used to extract only r: OpenAI API key is used to extract only relevant content from raw email. It will remove previous emails quoted by clients like gmail or outlook as well as signatures added by iPhone and other devices. :br This can be done by BeDesk without the API key, but it will be more consistent when using AI.
Send emails to :siteName from a 3rd part: Send emails to :siteName from a 3rd party application or a different website using REST API.
Send emails to :siteName using Mailgun i: Send emails to :siteName using Mailgun inbound routes functionality.
Verify that incoming request is really f: Verify that incoming request is really from mailgun. It's highly recommended to have this on, unless you are not able to receive emails from mailgun otherwise.
Connect your existing gmail acocunt usin: Connect your existing gmail acocunt using gmail API.
Pipe emails to :siteName from cpanel or: Pipe emails to :siteName from cpanel or another control panel used by your hosting provider.
Connect your existing email accounts to: Connect your existing email accounts to :siteName using IMAP.
Send a notification to customer, if thei: Send a notification to customer, if their ticket has not been created, because ticket creation via email is disabled.
When agent replies to ticket, send email: When agent replies to ticket, send email to customer who created the ticket.

Configure registration, social login and: Configure registration, social login and related 3rd party integrations.
All registration related functionality (: All registration related functionality (including social login) will be disabled.
Only allow one device to be logged into: Only allow one device to be logged into user account at the same time.
Use compact design for social login butt: Use compact design for social login buttons.
Comma separated list of domains. Users w: Comma separated list of domains. Users will not be able to register or login using any email adress from specified domains.

Create policies that will be shown on re: Create policies that will be shown on registration page. User will be required to accept them by toggling a checkbox.
Configure site url, homepage, theme and: Configure site url, homepage, theme and other general settings.
Base site url is set as <b>:baseUrl</b>: Base site url is set as :baseUrl in configuration, but current url is :currentUrl. It is recommended to set the primary url you want to use in configuration file and then redirect all other url versions to this primary version via cpanel or .htaccess file.
Which page should be used as site homepa: Which page should be used as site homepage.

Which theme to use for users that have n: Which theme to use for users that have not chosen a theme manually.
Allow users to manually change site them: Allow users to manually change site theme.

Configure global date, time and language: Configure global date, time and language settings.
Which timezone should be selected by def: Which timezone should be selected by default for new users and guests.
Which localization should be selected by: Which localization should be selected by default for new users and guests.
Default verbosity for all dates displaye: Default verbosity for all dates displayed across the site. Month/day order and separators will be adjusted automatically, based on user's locale.
If disabled, site will always be shown i: If disabled, site will always be shown in default language and user will not be able to change their locale.
Configure site error logging and related: Configure site error logging and related 3rd party integrations.
<a>Sentry</a> integration provides real-: Sentry integration provides real-time error tracking and helps identify and fix issues when site is in production.
Select active queue method and enter rel: Select active queue method and enter related 3rd party API keys.
Queues allow to defer time consuming tas: Queues allow to defer time consuming tasks, such as sending an email, until a later time. Deferring these tasks can speed up web requests to the application.
All methods except sync require addition: All methods except sync require additional setup, which should be performed before changing the queue method. Consult documentation for more information.
Configure google recaptcha integration a: Configure google recaptcha integration and credentials.
Enable recaptcha integration when creati: Enable recaptcha integration when creating links from homepage or user dashboard.
Enable recaptcha integration for \"conta: Enable recaptcha integration for "contact us" page.
Enable recaptcha integration for registr: Enable recaptcha integration for registration page.
Configure google analytics integration a: Configure google analytics integration and credentials.
Google analytics measurement ID only, no: Google analytics measurement ID only, not the whole javascript snippet.
Only required in order to show world geo: Only required in order to show world geochart on integrated analytics pages.
Configure gateway integration, accepted: Configure gateway integration, accepted cards, invoices and other related settings.
Enable or disable all subscription relat: Enable or disable all subscription related functionality across the site.
Default notes to show under `notes` sect: Default notes to show under `notes` section of user invoice. Optional.
Allows testing PayPal payments with sand: Allows testing PayPal payments with sandbox accounts.
View and update your account details, pr: View and update your account details, profile and more.
If you disable social logins, you'll sti: If you disable social logins, you'll still be able to log in using your email and password.
For your security, please confirm your p: For your security, please confirm your password to continue.
Confirm access to your account by enteri: Confirm access to your account by entering the authentication code provided by your authenticator application.
Your request is processing. We'll update: Your request is processing. We'll update you when your payment method is confirmed.
Payment method confirmation failed. Plea: Payment method confirmation failed. Please try another payment method.
Your plan will be canceled on :date: Your plan will be canceled on :date
We've sent an email to “:email“ to verif: We've sent an email to “:email“ to verify your email address and activate your account. The link in the the email will expire in 24 hours.
If you did not receive an email, click t: If you did not receive an email, click the button below and we will send you another one.
Something went wrong. Please try again.
Payment processing. We'll update you whe: Payment processing. We'll update you when payment is received.
Payment failed. Please try another payme: Payment failed. Please try another payment method.
Don't close this window until domain is: Don't close this window until domain is connected.
Enter the exact domain name you want you: Enter the exact domain name you want your items to be accessible with. It can be a subdomain (example.yourdomain.com) or root domain (yourdomain.com).
Whether all users should be able to sele: Whether all users should be able to select this domain.
Add this CNAME record to your domain by: Add this CNAME record to your domain by visiting your DNS provider or registrar.
Add this A record to your domain by visi: Add this A record to your domain by visiting your DNS provider or registrar.
DNS records for the domain are setup, ho: DNS records for the domain are setup, however it seems that your server is not configured to handle requests from “:host“
The domain is missing :record record poi: The domain is missing :record record pointing to :location or the changes haven't propagated yet.

Where should this menu appear on the sit: Where should this menu appear on the site
Click “add“ button to start adding links: Click “add“ button to start adding links, pages, routes and other items to this menu.
At least one theme is required: At least one theme is required
Are you sure you want to delete this the: Are you sure you want to delete this theme?
Whether this theme has light text on dar: Whether this theme has light text on dark background.
When light mode is selected, this theme: When light mode is selected, this theme will be used.
When dark mode is selected, this theme w: When dark mode is selected, this theme will be used.
This option will automatically update ch: This option will automatically update channel content every 24 hours using the specified method.
List all content of specified type: List all content of specified type
Automatically update content with specif: Automatically update content with specified method
Select cache provider and manually clear: Select cache provider and manually clear cache.
\"File\" is the best option for most cas: "File" is the best option for most cases and should not be changed, unless you are familiar with another cache method and have it set up on the server already.
Which method should be used for storing: Which method should be used for storing and retrieving cached items.
Usually the domain of your site (site.co: Usually the domain of your site (site.com)
Can be left empty, if your mailgun accou: Can be left empty, if your mailgun account is in the US region.
Change outgoing email handlers, email cr: Change outgoing email handlers, email credentials and other related settings.
All outgoing application emails will be: All outgoing application emails will be sent from this email address.
All outgoing application emails will be sent using this name.
Your selected mail method must be author: Your selected mail method must be authorized to send emails using this address and name.
Where emails from :contactPageUrl page s: Where emails from :contactPageUrl page should be sent to.
Which method should be used for sending: Which method should be used for sending outgoing application emails (like registration confirmation)
Configure search method used on the site: Configure search method used on the site as well as related 3rd party integrations.
Which method should be used for search r: Which method should be used for search related functionality across the site.
<a>Meilisearch</a> needs to be installed: Meilisearch needs to be installed and running for this method to work.
<a>Elasticsearch</a> needs to be install: Elasticsearch needs to be installed and running for this method to work.
Whenever a new search method is enabled,: Whenever a new search method is enabled, records that already exist in database need to be imported into the index. All records created after search method is enabled will be imported automatically.
Depending on number of records in databa: Depending on number of records in database, importing could take some time. Don't close this window while it is in progress.
Configure size and type of files that us: Configure size and type of files that users are able to upload. This will affect all uploads across the site.
Both X-Sendfile and X-Accel need to be e: Both X-Sendfile and X-Accel need to be enabled on the server first. When enabled, it will reduce server memory and CPU usage when previewing or downloading files, especially for large files.
Size (in bytes) for each file chunk. It: Size (in bytes) for each file chunk. It should only be changed if there is a maximum upload size on your server or proxy (for example cloudflare). If chunk size is larger then limit on the server, uploads will fail.
Maximum size (in bytes) for a single fil: Maximum size (in bytes) for a single file user can upload.
Disk space (in bytes) each user uploads: Disk space (in bytes) each user uploads are allowed to take up. This can be overridden per user.
List of allowed file types (jpg, mp3, pd: List of allowed file types (jpg, mp3, pdf etc.). Leave empty to allow all file types.
Prevent uploading of these file types, e: Prevent uploading of these file types, even if they are allowed above.
Maximum upload size on your server curre: Maximum upload size on your server currently is set to :size
Where should user private file uploads b: Where should user private file uploads be stored.
Where should user public uploads (like a: Where should user public uploads (like avatars) be stored.
Only change endpoint if you are using an: Only change endpoint if you are using another S3 compatible storage service.
Upload files directly from the browser t: Upload files directly from the browser to s3 without going through the server. It will save on server bandwidth and should result in faster upload times. This should be enabled, unless storage provider does not support multipart uploads.
If s3 provider is not configured to allo: If s3 provider is not configured to allow uploads from browser, this can be done automatically via CORS button below, when valid credentials are saved.
You have no personal access tokens yet: You have no personal access tokens yet
This token will be deleted immediately a: This token will be deleted immediately and permanently. Once deleted, it can no longer be used to make API requests.
Make sure to store the token in a safe p: Make sure to store the token in a safe place. After this dialog is closed, token will not be viewable anymore.
Your account will be deleted immediately: Your account will be deleted immediately and permanently. Once deleted, accounts can not be restored.
If necessary, you may log out of all of: If necessary, you may log out of all of your other browser sessions across all of your devices. Your recent sessions are listed below. If you feel your account has been compromised, you should also update your password.
To finish enabling two factor authentica: To finish enabling two factor authentication, scan the following QR code using your phone's authenticator application or enter the setup key and provide the generated OTP code.
You have not enabled two factor authenti: You have not enabled two factor authentication.
Two factor authentication has been disab: Two factor authentication has been disabled.
You have enabled two factor authenticati: You have enabled two factor authentication.
Store these recovery codes in a secure p: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.
When two factor authentication is enable: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.
Click the 'get access code' button to ge: Click the 'get access code' button to get dropbox access code, then paste it into the field below.
